findings.title: Lack of event emissions
findings.description: The missing event makes it difficult to track off-chain liquidity fee changes.

findings.title: Owner can burn user's token without their consent
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the ability to burn a user's tokens without their consent.

findings.title: Use of extcodesize can be exploited
Floating Pragma
findings.description: Contracts should be deployed with the same compiler version and flags that they have been tested with thoroughly. Using floating pragma does not ensure that the contracts will be deployed with the same version.
